Thanks for bringing it to steam.

Remember when Blizzard released Diablo 2? Remember how it was almost exactly the same game as Diablo 1 in every single way? Remember how after it came out, they completely forbade you from playing Diablo 1? Remember how one of its most advertised features just straight up [i]was not included[/i]?

No, you don't remember any of that, because that game came out back when Blizzard actually gave a damn about innovating upon their franchises. Now all they care about is the almighty dollar bill. Instead of giving away new characters for free, this "sequel" now forces you to either grind endlessly or pay up if you want to play as them. Keep in mind, this is a game whose core gameplay revolves around picking specific characters to counter the enemy team.

Blizzard, in the wise words of D-Generation X, "suck it".

Pros: I can shatter mercys with echo
Cons: the rest of the game
